      • setCellParams

        public static void setCellParams(TextView cell,
                                 int gravity,
                                 int paddingLeft,
                                 int paddingRight,
                                 int paddingTop,
                                 int paddingBottom,
                                 int borderWidth,
                                 int borderColor)
        Sets parameters to cell in table component.
        Parameters:
        cell - correcponting cell
        gravity - gravity of cell to be set
        paddingLeft - left padding of cell in pixels
        paddingRight - right padding of cell in pixels
        paddingTop - top padding of cell in pixels
        paddingBottom - bottom padding of cell in pixels
        borderWidth - width of cell border in pixels
        borderColor - color of cell border

        Parses string into date using ISO format or dd.MM.yyyy format.
        Parameters:
        date - string representation of date
        Returns:
        parsed date if it was in one of formats, null if date is not in specified formats.
